column1: Uchi////I've put off writing this review for about four months now
column2: mainly because I wasn't sure what I wanted to say about my experience. Don't get me wrong
column3: everything was good. I love the ambiance
column4: right down to the dim lights
column5: but I am not sure I really appreciated their strategy or the value for my overall meal. This is not the place to come on an empty stomach
column6: even if you are willing to shovel out whatever the costs for the price of 7+ items on the menu for maybe two people.
